description:
Join Spiritual Intuitive Teacher, Kamala Easton, Ph.D., as she shares spiritual answers and insights into the metaphysical causes of weight management. What are the deepest reasons for our inability to control cravings and maintain a healthy lifestyle? How can we take charge of issues in our lives which affect our eating patterns. Get in touch with your own divine nature to help you to heal your body issues. Learn how to "Own" your body. Become aware of your feeling realm and how it affects eating. Learn meditations to help you to "feel" and "communicate" with the body. Begin to identify WHAT in you wants more. And find out if your body "Doesn't want YOU."

This course is intended for anyone who has been struggling with weight issues and needs a new way to approach it. It is presented in lecture format in 4 sessions. Review sheets are included for you to print out and use daily.
title: Spiritual Weight Loss
